label: Protein and Energy Nutrition
description: Physiological aspects of protein and amino acids, fats and fatty acids, and carbohydrates as applied to higher animals; includes classification, digestion, absorption, utilization, metabolism, and dietary deficiencies and excesses. Prerequisite: MCB 450 or equivalent and ANSC 222 or equivalent.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: MCB 450 or equivalent and ANSC 222 or equivalent.
